Info.Changes: Major Rework to Backend - compact.exe is now called per file.| Poorly compressable files can be skipped (configurable from options menu)| Implemented workaround for the Windows Size on Disk bug for files >4GB| Added a check to make sure files outside the working directory are not compressed| Added Wiki Submission Form - submits results directly to google forms.| Multiple UI design tweaks and changes|
Info.Fixes: Multiple backend usability and performance changes
